channel.title: Posts on Alex Again
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alex Again

item.title: to be cringe is to be free
item.description:
A REMINDER

Be cringe. It’s good for you. I will be cringe on this blog. I will write and act in ways that don’t align with the image I want to present to others.

item.title: Who Are You and What are You Doing Here?
item.description:
The child of immigrant parents.

The spouse of a vagabond, learning to grow roots.

A former vagabond myself. (What does it take to have a Home?)

Filled with wonder and hope.

A parent of a young child.

What are you reminded of?

A patchwork quilt.

A discarded toy.

A bridge.

A stray dog.

A still pond.

A raging sea.

An alpine flower.

A ripening papaya.

I aspire to be more like the sun.

item.title: Introversion is Overrated
item.description:
I would call myself naturally more introverted.

I used to spend hours happily writing inside my private notebooks, never opening up to others about the deep things.

But, introspection can only get you so far.

You’re too close to yourself. You can’t see the lenses and models you use to make sense of the world because you’re too busy seeing with them.

You can’t examine a pair of glasses while you’re wearing them.

item.title: Unsent Letter to a Nice man in Taiwan
item.description:
Thank you mysterious toothless man, for the free bunch of bananas and the free Russian grammar book.

I’m glad you liked my song so much; the white beach and blue ocean really set the mood for it. It was pretty windy that day! You must have tied your loincloth pretty tight. Is that all you wear, every day?

Do you make your living selling used books out of your truck by the beach? You seemed pretty happy, with your bananas and books. The white loincloth really matches your hair.

item.title: Vibe-coding with Hugo
item.description: This is my second attempt at a simple blog made with static site generator Hugo.
